script.name: plugin.guilds.addtrade
script.description: Guilds: Add a trade item to Guild Board
script.sourceplaintext:
$Guild.Data = get global variable: name='guilds.data' if $Guild.Data $tGuild = $Guild.Data[$a.guild] if $tGuild if $a.buy $data = $Guild.Data['ware.buying'] if not $data $data = array alloc: size=0 $Guild.Data['ware.buying'] = $data end else $data = $Guild.Data['ware.selling'] if not $data $data = array alloc: size=0 $Guild.Data['ware.selling'] = $data end end
$guild.level = $tGuild['level'] do if $guild.level < 1 $guild.level = 1
$a = array alloc: size=10 $a[0] = $a.ware if $a.qty > 0 $a[1] = $a.qty else $price = get average price of ware $a.ware $price.min = 1000000 + ( 4000000 * ( $guild.level - 1 ) ) $price.max = 2000000 + ( 7000000 * ( $guild.level - 1 ) ) $total.price = random value from $price.min to $price.max - 1 $a.qty = $total.price / $price $a[1] = $a.qty end $price.avr = get average price of ware $a.ware if $a.buy $price.min = get min price of ware $a.ware $price.half = ( $price.avr - $price.min ) / 2 $price.half = $price.min + $price.half $price.min = linear interpolation: x1=10, x2=1, y1=$price.min, y2=$price.half, value=$guild.level $price.max = linear interpolation: x1=10, x2=1, y1=$price.half, y2=$price.avr, value=$guild.level else $price.max = get max price of ware $a.ware $price.half = ( $price.max - $price.avr ) / 2 $price.half = $price.avr + $price.half $price.min = linear interpolation: x1=1, x2=10, y1=$price.avr, y2=$price.half, value=$guild.level $price.max = linear interpolation: x1=1, x2=10, y1=$price.half, y2=$price.max, value=$guild.level end $price = random value from $price.min to $price.max - 1 $a[2] = $price if $a.expire <= 0 OR ! $a.expire $a.expire = random value from 28800 to 70000 - 1 end $current.time = playing time $expire = $current.time + $a.expire $a[3] = $expire $a[4] = $a.guild $xp.min = 200 * ( $guild.level + 1 ) $xp.max = 300 * ( $guild.level + 1 ) $xp = random value from $xp.min to $xp.max - 1 $a[5] = $xp $a[6] = [FALSE] $a[7] = $a.qty if is datatype[ $a.sector ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR $a[8] = $a.sector else if is datatype[ $a.sector ] == DATATYPE_RACE gosub sub.GetSectors $i = size of array $aSectors while $i dec $i = $sector = $aSectors[$i] $sector.owner = $sector -> get owner race if $sector.owner != $a.sector remove element from array $aSectors at index $i end end if not size of array $aSectors return null end $sector = get random array item: array=$aSectors $a[8] = $sector else gosub sub.GetSectors $i = size of array $aSectors while $i dec $i = $sector = $aSectors[$i] $sector.owner = $sector -> get owner race if $sector.owner == Kha'ak OR $sector.owner == Xenon remove element from array $aSectors at index $i end end if not size of array $aSectors return null end $sector = get random array item: array=$aSectors $a[8] = $sector end
if $a.range < 1 OR ! $a.range $a.range = random value from 6 to 11 - 1 end $a[9] = $a.range
append $a to array $data end end
return null
sub.GetSectors: @ $main.universe = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.getmainuniverse : $aSectors = $main.universe -> find all sectors within 100 jumps: Only known sectors=[FALSE] @ = wait 1 ms endsub return null

sval.val: Guilds: Add a trade item to Guild Board
